pageContext.claim: “Well, they [Turkey] did [buy Russian missiles]. And they tried to buy ours, and the Obama administration said, ‘You can't have them.’ Okay?”
pageContext.analysis: This is inaccurate. "The U.S. has sought to sell Ankara the Patriot air-defense missile since at least 2013, but Erdogan has insisted it come with a transfer of technology so that Turkey can develop and build its own missiles. The Obama administration declined," as Bloomberg reported.
